#summary Details Of Idle Mode
= Introduction =

This is idle mode - the default state the robot enters on power up. On exit of this mode the robot will take up basic pose and enter experimental mode

= Details =

{{{
Options (serial)
P or p    Exit to Experimental Mode
S or s    Exit to SlaveSerial Mode
?         Query - output in Ascii to serial port the mode its in (in this Idle Mode)

Options (IR)
[]        Exit to Experimental mode (Red Button)
}}}
